txt.en: You have defeated many of the Orcs and goblins subservient to Ránulur's warg pack. This should make them less of a threat to the people of the Vales, and make a dent in the clearing of Shathur-munzu.
Defeated Orcs and goblins in Shathur-munzu ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat Orcs and goblins in Shathur-munzu

You see Orcs and goblins inside Shathur-munzu, but unlike their usual relationship, these appear to be subservient to the wargs. Perhaps it is because of the presence of Ránulur. You believe that you should eliminate these goblins, regardless of the chain of command, as they pose a threat to the people of Arhaim.
Orcs and goblins living in Shathur-munzu appear to be subservient to the Wargs. They should be eliminated.
Orcs and goblins subservient to the wargs can be found inside Shathur-munzu.\n\nYou should defeat any Orcs and goblins you find.
Defeat Orcs and goblins in Shathur-munzu ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
